task.title: Previewing Multiple Stages
task.shortdesc: You can preview data for a group of linked stages within a pipeline.

context.p: data previewpreviewing multiple stagesWhen you preview multiple stages, you select the first stage and the last stage in the group. The Preview panel then displays the input data and the output data for the group. The input data is the data that enters the first stage. The output data is the data that passes from the last stage.
In the Preview panel, you can review the values for each record to determine if the group of stages transforms data as expected.

step.cmd: To preview multiple stages, click Multiple.
step.info: The Preview panel displays two lists of stages.

step.cmd: From the list on the left, select the first stage to use.
In the list on the right, select the last stage to use.
step.info: The Preview panel displays the input and output data for the group of stages. You can review the details of each record.

step.cmd: To return to previewing a single stage, click Single.
